title: 权限插件问题
author: iwinhoo
txt_content: 我想给builder加入paintball.general权限和panintball.shop.not<id>权限怎么办？给我指令

replies.author: iwinhoo
replies.txt_content:
-Love- 发表于 2015-2-3 18:48
/mangaddp builder paintball.general
/mangaddp builder panintball.shop.not
就这么输入？

就这么输入？
